snippet: Health Secretary Andrew Lansley ordered British clinics to quickly report how many of the implants have ruptured or oozed.
abstract: British Health Secretary Andrew Lansley, under increasing pressure to follow French health officials' recommendation to remove breast implants made with low-grade silicone, orders British clinics to quickly report how many of the implants have ruptured or oozed.

byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and MAÏA DE LA BAUME

lead_paragraph: Health Secretary Andrew Lansley ordered British clinics to quickly report how many of the implants have ruptured or oozed.

headline.seo: British Seek Data to Help Decide on Breast Implant Removal
headline.main: British Seek Data on Suspect Breast Implants
headline.print_headline: British Seek Data on Suspect Breast Implants
